de.weltraumschaf.commons.system

Class BrowserLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.commons.system.BrowserLauncher

  • public final class BrowserLauncher
extends Object
    This class opens default browser for DemoLauncher class.

    Default browser is detected by the operating system.

    Copied from Vaadin browser launcher.

    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  BrowserLauncher.CliCommands
      Collects browser open commands for the CLI of various operating systems and browsers.
      (package private) static class  BrowserLauncher.DefaultExecutor
      Default implementation which delegates to Runtime.
      static interface  BrowserLauncher.Executor
      Abstracts process execution.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BrowserLauncher

        public BrowserLauncher()
        Default constructor.

        Try to determine operating system by itself via system property.

      • BrowserLauncher

        public BrowserLauncher(OperatingSystem os)
        Create launcher for particular operating system.

        You can determine the OS e.g. this way: 

        final BrowserLauncher launcher new BrowserLauncher(
      OperatingSystem.determine(System.getProperty(OperatingSystem.OS_SYSTEM_PROPERTY, "")));
        Parameters:
        os - detected operating system, must not be null

      • BrowserLauncher

        public BrowserLauncher(OperatingSystem os,
               BrowserLauncher.Executor runtime)
        Dedicated constructor.
        Parameters:
        os - detected operating system, must not be null
        runtime - runtime for command execution, must not be null

    • Method Detail

      • openBrowser

        public void openBrowser(String url)
        Open browser on specified URL.

        This method throws an IllegalArgumentException if the OS (given by constructor) is not supported.

        This method throws an RuntimeException if the browser can't be started.

        Parameters:
        url - URL to open, must not be null or empty

      • openLinuxBrowser

        private Process openLinuxBrowser(String url)
                          throws IOException
        Opens browser on GNU/Linux.
        Parameters:
        url - URL to open.
        Returns:
        true if started
        Throws:
        IOException - if no browser can be opened

      • isKonquerorTheDefaultBrowser

        private boolean isKonquerorTheDefaultBrowser()
        See if the default browser is Konqueror by resolving the symlink.
        Returns:
        true if Konqueror is default browser, else false

      • openMacBrowser

        private Process openMacBrowser(String url)
                        throws IOException
        Opens browser on Mac OS X.
        Parameters:
        url - URL to open.
        Returns:
        true if started
        Throws:
        IOException - if browser can not be opened

      • openWindowsBrowser

        private Process openWindowsBrowser(String url)
                            throws IOException
        Opens browser on Microsoft Windows.
        Parameters:
        url - URL to open.
        Returns:
        true if started
        Throws:
        IOException - if browser can not be opened

      • execCommand

        private Process execCommand(BrowserLauncher.CliCommands cmd,
                  String argument)
                     throws IOException
        Executes external command to open URL.
        Parameters:
        cmd - external command, must not be null or empty
        argument - argument string, must not be null or empty
        Returns:
        A new Process object for managing the subprocess
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
